title: Data Management Tool -SME
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**About us**
------------


‘Data’ is a function within Volvo Digital & IT with the goal to unlock the power of data for the full Volvo Group to become a fully data-driven company! With data as the core component of our transformation journey, we will, together with our data talents, make the Volvo Group 2030 vision happen. We will take care of all aspects of Data, including quality assurance, documentation, availability, preparation, and use through BI, Analytics, and Machine Learning supporting the organization with AI implementation process. We have an ambitious transformation ahead, with the implementation of the Data Layer in Azure and the reinforcement of Data Governance and Data Management across the entire Group.

  

We are looking for experienced Data Management Tool Experts to help us reform our Data Governance & Management practice and support our business by providing experience, support and guidance of tooling within this area. Our aim and your mission are to shape the strategic direction of the Volvo Group to become a data-driven company. In doing so, we will make quality-assured data available and stimulate its reuse and value across the value chain, while remaining fully compliant with legal and policy requirements. You will be an important ally to every organization who wants to invest in change within our data journey.

**Your Responsiblities Include**
--------------------------------

* Perform technical maintenance & support of Informatica IDMC, focusing on Data Catalog and Data Marketplace modules.
* Manage IDMC services catalog and offer guidance on optimal service usage.
* Deliver foundational capabilities of Informatica IDMC, emphasizing Data Catalog and Data Marketplace modules.
* Collaborate with vendor product management team to prioritize deliveries meeting Volvo Group needs.
* Serve as Single Point of Contact for functional aspects of Data Management Tool Data Governance.
* Manage Access Management policies for the Data Management Tool.
* Plan, design, prepare, and conduct trainings.
* Support Data Catalog and Data Marketplace deliveries and product development.
* Assist projects and prioritize deliveries as team member.
* Participate in user acceptance tests of new releases of Data Catalog and Data Marketplace modules.
**Required skill set:**
-----------------------

* University degree, with a passion for data.
* Hands-on experience with (preferably) Informatica IDMC or (alternatively) Informatica on-prem
* In-depth knowledge of Data Catalog & Data Marketplace modules of Informatica IDMC or other tools
* Full implementation cycle experience in Data Catalog & Data Marketplace modules.
* Expertise in Data Governance & Management.
* Experience in agile setups, using DevOps or similar.
* Ability to oversee implementation activities.
* Strong communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills.
* Proficiency in English for international projects.
**Ready for the next move?**
----------------------------


Imagine yourself working with the sharpest and most creative brains in the transport and infrastructure industry, developing cutting-edge technologies and sustainable transport solutions that will change the future of society.  

  

For any questions please don't hesitate to reach out to Mathilda Janson, Data Availability Manager mathilda.janson@volvo.com.


This role requires a balance of in-office and remote work, with an expectation to be in the office three days a week.


For candidates applying in EU, applicants must have a valid work permit to work in the EU.

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Digital & IT** is the hub for digital development within Volvo Group. Imagine yourself working with cutting-edge technologies in a global team, represented in more than 30 countries. We are dedicated to leading the way of tomorrow’s transport solutions, guided by a strong customer mindset and high level of curiosity, both as individuals and as a team. Here, you will thrive in your career in an environment where your voice is heard and your ideas matter.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: Digital Product Owner -Senior for Data Management Tool
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**About us**
------------


‘Data’ is a function within Volvo Digital & IT with the goal to unlock the power of data for the full Volvo Group to become a fully data-driven company! With data, the core component of our transformation journey, we will, together with our data talents, make the Volvo Group 2030 vision happen. We will take care of all the aspects of Data, how it is quality assured, documented, made available, prepared, and used through BI, Analytics and Machine Learning. We have an ambitious transformation in front of us, with an implementation of the Data Layer in Azure as well as the reinforcement of Data Governance and Data Management in the full Group.

 **What you will do**

  

As the Digital Product Owner for the Data Management Tool (DMT), you will drive the product vision, ensure alignment with strategy, and manage team backlog prioritization and delivery. Your expertise in Data Governance and Management, along with strong communication and analytical skills, will be vital for this role.  

To be successful in this role you require knowledge and experience from Data Governance and Data Management. You have an analytical mindset, excellent structuring skills, as well as communication and stakeholder management skills. This in combination with a pragmatic can-do attitude will enable you to be part of and help drive the data transformation.  

  

The ‘Data’ function is a large multi-cultural organization with 600+ employees and contractors located mainly in 7 countries - Sweden, Poland, India, Belgium, Brazil, USA, and France.


This is a Flexible position, and in this role, you will be joining as a Digital Product Owner for Data Management Tool in Gothenburg (Sweden), Bengaluru (India) or Wroclaw (Poland). Please mention the location while you apply.

**Your Responsibilities Include**
---------------------------------

* Assisting in organizing and prioritizing the product development backlog.
* Supporting the team in creating product specifications and providing necessary support to aid team delivery.
* Contributing to, championing the product vision, and ensuring that team development aligns with long and short-term plans.
* Continuously reviewing the digital product for improvement opportunities.
* Advising stakeholders on optimal use of the DMT and help maintaining the service catalog. Also collaborate with stakeholders for seamless onboarding.

  

You will coordinate with various internal Data Governance and Management products, ensuring seamless integration and functionality. The role involves managing the technical roadmap and liaising with vendors to align goals and deliverables. Responsibilities include handling the functional aspects of Data governance, providing ongoing technical maintenance and support, and diligently monitoring platform SLAs to maintain high standards of service.

**Required Competencies**
-------------------------

* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Systems Engineering, or similar.
* Documented experience in Data Governance & Management.
* Hands-on experience with (preferably) Informatica IDMC or (alternatively) Informatica on-prem

  

To excel in this role, you should have prior experience leading an Agile/DevOps team. You possess strong communication, presentation, and stakeholder management skills, catering to varying levels of technical expertise. Your solid IT foundation, coupled with robust business acumen, and exceptional organizational skills, will be crucial to your success. Proficiency in both written and spoken English is essential.

 **Does this sound exciting? Do you have any questions?**

  

Please do not hesitate to reach out to Mathilda Janson, Data Availability Manager mathilda.janson@volvo.com.

  

This role requires a balance of in-office and remote work, with an expectation to be in the office three days a week.


For candidates applying in EU, applicants must have a valid work permit to work in the EU.

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Digital & IT** is the hub for digital development within Volvo Group. Imagine yourself working with cutting-edge technologies in a global team, represented in more than 30 countries. We are dedicated to leading the way of tomorrow’s transport solutions, guided by a strong customer mindset and high level of curiosity, both as individuals and as a team. Here, you will thrive in your career in an environment where your voice is heard and your ideas matter.

title: Teknisk testare/ Testautomatiserare
description:
**Teknisk testare/QA**


Älskar du tech, utveckling och utmaningar? Är din inställning “uppåt-framåt”, snarare än ”sitt still i båten”? Bra, du har kommit till rätt ställe!


Nexer växer och vi behöver bli fler i vårt team East Tech i Stockholm. Med dryga 11 år i genomsnitt i branschen axlar vi seniora roller, tar mycket ansvar och gör stor nytta hos våra kunder. Det finns stor passion för utveckling och vi inspirerar varandra att hålla oss i framkant med ny teknik.


Vi söker dig som har en passion för teknisk testning. Gillar att analysera testresultat och coacha utvecklingsteamen inom testområdet.

  

  



**Om dig**


* Minst 5 års professionell erfarenhet av testarbete.
* Erfarenhet av att skapa och underhålla testautomationsramverk för kvalitetssäkrade IT-leveranser.
* Gärna erfarenhet av programmeringsspråk som Python, Java, eller .NET.
* Erfarenhet av API-testning (t.ex. Postman, SoapUI, Ready API).
* Erfarenhet av frontend-testning med verktyg (t.ex. Playwright, Cypress).
* Erfarenhet av testhanteringssystem (t.ex. Jira, Azure Devops).
* Microsoft Services och SOAP/REST-baserade tjänster och verktyg.
* ISTQB certifiering.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med AI-drivna testverktyg eller ramverk, såsom verktyg för att generera testfall baserat på maskininlärning.
* Du är van att leda och ansvara för både större och mindre testprojekt samt är van vid agila metoder så som SAFe, Scrum eller Kanban.
* Du är en god kommunikatör och du behärskar både svenska och engelska.
* Du bor i Stockholmsområdet.

**Om Nexer**


Vi är Sverige största privatägda konsultbolag med fina värderingar. Vi erbjuder en bred portfölj av tjänster inom alla områden av digital transformation – från avancerad analys och systemutveckling till automatisering och artificiell intelligens. Nexer har ett stort samhällsengagemang, bland annat genom Women in tech, Star for Life och Kodcentrum. Vi leder förändring och strävar hela tiden efter att hitta innovativa och kreativa lösningar för våra kunder och samhället i stort.

title: Junior ingenjör/konstruktör till Vetronics Design på BAE Systems Hägglunds
description:
***Är du i början på din karriär med intresse för produktutveckling och vill utvecklas på vår elsystemavdelning? Vi växer och behöver därför förstärka vårt team med nyfikna och drivna personer som vill vara med att utveckla framtidens militära fordon från idé till färdig produkt. Vår koncern befinner sig i teknikens absoluta framkant och det finns stora möjligheter för dig att bygga upp din kompetens och göra karriär hos oss!”***

***Tveka inte, skicka in din ansökan redan idag!***

 **Vi erbjuder dig**


Oavsett var du står i dag i din karriär kommer du att få ett spännande och varierande arbete i en högteknologisk miljö. Du får möjlighet att arbeta i en kunskapsintensiv verksamhet som utvecklas och växer. Beroende på din bakgrund har vi möjlighet att anpassa rollen efter dina önskemål och kunskapsnivå. Ditt arbete hos oss kommer att innebära många olika kontaktytor, framför allt inom företaget men även mot leverantörer och kunder. Möjlighet till visst distansarbete finns. Genom vårt introduktionsprogram får du insyn i andra avdelningars arbete och lär känna företaget.

 **Din framtida utmaning**


På elsystemavdelningen kommer du arbeta med utveckling av tunga fordon och dess elektrifiering. Du jobbar i ett projektteam som dagligen kommer driva produktutvecklingen framåt i ett tätt samarbete med angränsande områden.


Du kommer att arbeta med hela produktcykeln, bland annat:  

* Utveckling av framtidens elsystem.
* Val av komponenter samt upprättande av utvecklingsspecifikationer.
* Framtagning av schematisk design samt tillverkningsunderlag för kablage.
* Analys av marknadens existerande komponenter och delsystem.
* Analys och provning mot militära standarder.
* Vårt utvecklingsverktyg är E3-series.
 **Den du är**


Du är en person som är motiverad till att ständigt utvecklas. Du är öppen för att tänka nytt och redo att hjälpa till att införa nya arbetssätt. Du är strukturerad och lösningsorienterad. Du strävar efter att leverera hållbara resultat som ser till helhetens bästa. Vi ser att du trivs i en roll där du får samarbeta och kommunicera med andra både inom teamet och organisationen. Du är en person som har mod att ställa frågor, då du vet att dina frågor hjälper både dig och dina kollegor att utvecklas. Din kreativitet och intresse för produktutveckling är något du sprider till din omgivning, såväl som ditt engagemang för att utveckla teamet och verksamheten.

 **För att lyckas i rollen har du:**

* En relevant utbildningsbakgrund som Yrkeshögskole, Högskole- eller Civilingenjör, eller arbetslivserfarenhet inom design eller annat relevant tekniskt område.
* Goda kunskaper i Svenska och Engelska, både muntligt och skriftligt.

 **Meriterande om du har:**


Erfarenhet av att arbeta i projekt, med till exempel LCM (Life Cycle Management). Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt. Erfarenhet av Azure DevOps.

 **Din framtida utmaning**


Som ingenjör på elsystemavdelningen kommer du arbeta med utveckling av tunga fordon och dess elektrifiering. Du jobbar i ett projektteam som dagligen kommer driva produktutvecklingen framåt.


Du kommer att arbeta med hela produktcykeln, bland annat:  

* Utveckling av framtidens elsystem.
* Val av komponenter samt upprättande av utvecklingsspecifikationer.
* Framtagning av schematisk design samt tillverkningsunderlag för kablage.
* Analys av marknadens existerande komponenter och delsystem.
* Analys och provning mot militära standarder.
* Vårt utvecklingsverktyg är E3-series och erfarenheter inom E3 eller liknande system är meriterande.
 **Den du är**  

Vi ser gärna att du är utbildad ingenjör eller har gått yrkeshögskole inom el-, automation-, elektroniksystem. Det är en stor fördel men inget krav, om du dessutom har yrkeserfarenhet inom någon av följande roller kabeldesign, Elhybriddrivlinor samt kablagedesign för högvoltsystem, EMC ( Electromagnetic compatibility ),BMS ( battle management systems ). God svenska och engelska i tal/skrift är krav.


Som person har du en god samarbets- och kommunikationsförmåga, en positiv grundsyn och gillar kreativ problemlösning. Du är ordningsam och kan planera ditt arbete. Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet att upprätta planer och formella dokument.

 **Vad du blir en del av**


Hos oss kommer du att ha kul på jobbet och ingen dag kommer att vara den andra lik! Du kommer att få vara med när produkten blir till från idé till dess att den rullar ut till kund. Du kommer att få jobba med framtidens teknik i ett globalt företag där du har stora möjligheter till kompetens- & karriärutveckling.


BAE Systems levererar några av världens mest avancerade, teknikledande lösningar inom försvar, flyg och säkerhet. Vi har 82 500 kvalificerade medarbetare i mer än 40 länder. Genom att vi arbetar tillsammans med kunder och lokala partners, levererar vi produkter och tjänster med militär kapacitet, som skyddar människor och den nationella säkerheten samt säkrar viktig information och infrastruktur.


BAE Systems Hägglunds fokuserar på utveckling, tillverkning, integration och support av ett brett spektrum av militära fordon till kunder över hela världen. Våra främsta produkter är medeltunga stridsfordon (CV90), bepansrade terrängfordon (BvS10), stöd och support samt elhybrida drivsystem för den civila marknaden. Pålitlig, Innovativ och Djärv är ledorden för vår verksamhet.


För mer information besök www.baesystems.com


Läs gärna mer om Örnsköldsvik och Höga Kusten på www.jobbaochlev.se/ - www.inspiration.ornskoldsvik.se - www.hogakusten.com/sv


Om du inte kan se filmen, klicka på länken: https://youtu.be/spyM86NLbOk

 **Kontaktperson**


Har du frågor kring tjänsten, är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till rekryterande chef Björn Söderström 0660-87884 alternativt rekryteringskonsult Cathrine Lind AxÖ Consulting 070-577 06 18.


Vi är ett företag som arbetar med försvarssekretess. Det finns legala krav och krav som våra kunder ställer på oss som företag. Alla som anställs ska genomföra säkerhetskontroll samt drogtest. Alla våra anställda genomgår dessa rutiner.


Tjänsten är tillsvidareanställning och placeringsort är Örnsköldsvik.


OBS! Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande så skicka in din ansökan redan nu.

  

Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Technical Lead Embedded Software
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



**Technical Lead Embedded Software**



Sigma Connectivity is growing, and we are looking for a tech-lead within embedded software. Are you interested in meeting and collaborating with international customers and growing your team to deliver world class solutions? What we can offer is a fast-growing company with international customers that own some of the most well-known brands in the world. An environment where no day is the same and you get the opportunity to try different things all the time.



**Role description**



As a Technical Lead at Sigma Connectivity, you are directly involved in the core of our business at our Lund office, meeting and understanding the customer´s vision and needs. Writing statements of work and defining the system architecture needed to realize it. You work together with our team of experienced software developers to deliver great solutions within the constraints of the project.



You will be instrumental in writing Quotations, making design choices to realize customer’s product/service vision. You are also expected to lead Software team in a project. You have the ability to work with all the different stakeholders in an organization such as the software leadership team, Project managers, Sales and Software engineers. You will be coaching other engineers and grow them technically. As a technical lead it is expected that you know or can learn about the latest technological trends in a given area. Actively work with software management team to realize competence growth for Sigma Connectivity to stay as premium software services provider.



**Tasks & responsibilities**



* Embedded programming & software development
* Work in teams with other software developers & testers
* Leading a software team technically, focusing a team on the right things to do at the moment
* Motivate team members and identify things not working in a team
* Working hands on as senior member of a software team with a variety of tasks
* Meeting customers and understanding what they want from a technical perspective
* Analyzing customer needs and requirements and create a feasible solution or setup
* Estimating work and team setup needed to realize a project
* Helping out to write quotations or pre-studies for customers
* Be a point of contact for the team for both customer and project management


**Technical requirements**



* Strong programming skills in least C/C++ and a scripting language of choice
* 12+ years of embedded software development on a wide range of platforms and OS/RTOS such as Embedded Linux, Nordic(Zephyr), STM(FreeRTOS), TI(TI-RTOS) etc.
* Comfortable in all aspects of embedded SW development with everything from reading schematics, debugging hardware, bringup, bootloaders, embedded architecture & design, device drivers, debuggers, implementation, test, scripting & automation, devOps and so on.
* Linux Centric – Prefers working in a Linux environment and have extensive knowledge of Linux and the tools available on Linux to be able to build and solve problems, on both device and host.
* Have worked with one or more wireless connectivity stacks such as Bluetooth, Wifi, NFC, LTE, Matter, UWB, etc


**Personal characteristics**



* Good listener, ability to understand and to ask the right questions
* Self-drive and a proactive approach to successfully deliver projects.
* Want to grow yourself in different areas, both technically and on a personal level
* Great at getting ‘un-stuck’ and finding creative ways to solve problems, technically or organization-wise.
* Good knowledge of software development best practices both from a technical and team perspective
* Ability to Coach and Motivate others
* Flexibility to jump into unknown technology areas and projects to ensure good customer experience.

### **MORE INFORMATION**



For more information please contact



Niklas Alverup,  

Niklas.Alverup@sigmaconnectivity.com



* #### **POSITION**


Technical Lead Embedded Software
* #### **COMPANY**


Sigma Connectivity
* #### **LOCATION**


Lund, Sweden
* #### **COMPETENCE AREA**


Software development embedded systems
* #### **PUBLICATION DATE**


2024-10-07
* #### **EXPIRATION DATE**


2024-11-07
* #### **CONTACT**


Niklas Alverup, Niklas.Alverup@sigmaconnectivity.com, +46703177389

title: Machine Learning Engineer in MLE
description:
Machine Learning Engineer in MLE


Swedium Global is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer


The primary tasks for a senior level Machine Learning Engineer in MLE area are:


* Develop AI/ML software products including but not limited to explore large data set, try out new algorithms, feature engineering, test and evaluate model output, deploy the solution for production usage and scale out for a maintainable solution in the comprehensive fashion network of H&M.
* Design, develop and maintain the large-scale data infrastructure required for the AI/ML projects.
* Leverage on understanding of software architecture and software design patterns contributing to architectural decisions, technical roadmap planning, and to write scalable, maintainable, well-designed, and future-proof code.
* Develop solutions, components, services and frameworks to address both specific and common needs in AI/ML projects, like feature reuse, model traceability, monitoring, A/B test, versioning, release, and serving of both online inference end-points and batch inference.
* Work in cross-functional agile team of highly skilled engineers, data scientists, and business stakeholders - to build the AI ecosystem within the company.


Required skills and experiences:


* Have a BSc or MSc degree in computer science, engineering or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
* Have 5+ years’ professional experience working in relevant role(s) for a senior level Machine Learning Engineer.
* A hands-on person, with great software engineering skills, who loves coding, and like applying good software engineering practices and DevOps principals to machine learning and AI projects.
* Have experience in developing software products that have been successfully deployed to production and scaled in a bigger organization, also ensuring product quality, security and performance.
* Have several years of coding experience in modern programming languages, and strong background in Python programming, i.e. 4+ years.
* Have great hands-on experience with cloud technologies for ML development, preferably Google Cloud Platform, and also including Vertex AI.
* Have solid experience in MLOps practices, developing ML pipelines, data pipelines and deploying ML applications to production.
* Have a strong working knowledge of a variety of AI/ML techniques and experience working with different frameworks.
* Have experience handling and developing for high volume heterogeneous data (both batch and stream), preferably also including hands-on development in DBT, and have also a solid understanding of cloud data storage technologies and data quality.
* Have experience from aligning and analyzing requirement; driving design solutions; breaking down work into stories and tasks; supporting and mentoring team members; and making sure organizational standards and best-practices are implemented and followed.
* Familiar with agile ways of working, team collaboration and data-driven development.


**Required cloud certification:** GCP Professional Machine Learning Engine


  
Job Overview


* Location : Stockholm, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : GCP, AL/ML, Python, MLOps, DevOps

title: DevOps-tekniker
description:
**DevOps-tekniker**
===================


Sista ansökningsdatum: 18 oktober

Svenska kraftnät är en av de viktigaste aktörerna för en hållbar energiomställning. Som DevOps-tekniker erbjuds du ett av Sveriges viktigast IT jobb, i vilket du varje dag kommer att bidra till Sveriges elförsörjning.



Vi behöver dig för att lyckas med vårt samhällsviktiga uppdrag att elektrifiera Sverige. Vi är idag cirka 500 personer på IT och är i en tillväxtfas där vi kommer att växa de kommande åren. Detta för att kunna skapa förutsättningar för Sverige att kunna fördubbla sin elproduktion och nå klimatmålen genom att helt ställa om till fossilfri energi. För att lyckas kommer vi att använda oss av den senaste tekniken för att öka kapaciteten i vår infrastruktur och samtidigt öka utvecklingstakten kring system, digitalisering och processer.



Vill du jobba och utvecklas i en växande organisation och tillsammans med underbara medarbetare skapa en framåtlutad och robust IT- organisation, sök dig till oss!


**Om tjänsten**
---------------



Som applikationsnära DevOps-tekniker på Svenska kraftnät får du möjligheten att vara med och forma framtidens lösningar inom energibranschen. I din roll kommer du att arbeta med drift, förvaltning och utveckling av applikationer och tjänster som hanterar elkraftsförsörjningen i hela Norden.



Enheten ansvarar för och tillhandahåller robust, effektiv och värdeskapande förvaltning och utveckling av systemstöd för balansering av kraftsystemet som stödjer såväl nationell som nordisk och europeisk marknad. Den här delen av Svenska kraftnät är en 24/7-verksamhet vilket innebär att rollen innefattar beredskap och en förståelse för hur man hanterar och löser kritiska problem i verksamhets- och samhällskritiska system.



Du kommer att ingå i ett dynamiskt team bestående av systemansvariga, lösningsarkitekter och DevOps-tekniker och systemutvecklare. Tillsammans arbetar ni med att vidmakthålla och vidareutveckla befintliga applikationer samtidigt som ni utvecklar nya lösningar för den nordiska och europeiska balansmarknaden.



Vi söker främst dig med erfarenhet av verksamhetsnära applikationer, då din roll innebär att:


* Hantera incidenter, problem och felsökningar i andra linjen.
* Automatisera flöden och bidra till att förbättra arbetssätt och rutiner och samtidigt ge stöd och support internt och externt.
* Utveckla nya lösningar och vidareutveckla befintliga lösningar utifrån verksamhetens behov.
* Bistå vid teknisk kravspecificering, delaktig i att sätta upp och konfigurera nya lösningar och skapa integrationer mellan olika applikationer.
* Arbeta med att skapa och underhålla automatiska bygg-, test-, säkerhetsgranskningar och driftsättning av applikationer och tjänster i våra egna datacenter.
* Delta i arbete med IT-säkerhet genom att bistå vid risk- och sårbarhetsanalyser, omvärldsbevaka informationssäkerhet mm
* Samordna och genomföra olika typer av tester självständigt och tillsammans med verksamheten och våra säkerhets- och testspecialister.
* Bidra till utvecklingen av Sveriges kraftsystem genom underhåll och bevakning samt utveckling av applikationer.

**Om dig**
----------



För att bli framgångsrik i den här rollen ser vi att du ha god samarbetsförmåga då arbetet innefattar många interna och externa kontaktytor. Du har en problemlösande analysförmåga och kan hantera komplexa problem samtidigt som du är självgående och tar ansvar för dina arbetsområden. Då arbetsbelastningen kan skifta ser vi att du är flexibel och anpassningsbar, serviceinriktad och hjälpsam. Du har ett genuint intresse att hålla dig uppdaterad inom området och främjar innovation. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.


*Skallkrav*  

Du har examen från högskola/universitet inom systemvetenskap eller motsvarande erfarenhet förvärvad på annat sätt som vi bedömer likvärdig. Du har också:


* Minst 10 års erfarenhet av arbete med användarnära applikationer i Linux-miljö där installationer, konfiguration och uppgraderingar av system har ingått.
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet från eget praktiskt arbete med containerplattformar där Kubernetes eller OpenShift i klustermiljö har ingått för vidmakthållande och vidareutveckling.
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med automation, konfiguration och scriptning i t.ex. Ansible, bash, PowerShell och YAML.
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av applikationsutveckling av Java-applikationer och driftsättning i DevOps-miljö.
* God förståelse för integrationsgränssnitt, t.ex. RH Fuse, JMS eller Webservices.
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet från elbranschen eller motsvarande.
* Du har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.


*Meriterande*


* Agila metoder som t.ex. Scrum och SAFe.
* Eget praktiskt arbete med hantering av Apache Kafka, XML och SQL.
* Monitorering med hjälp av Grafana & Prometheus. ITIL, PM3 mot verksamhetskritiska system.

**Bra att veta**
----------------


* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg.
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 %
* Resor kan förekomma i denna tjänst.
* Sista ansökningsdag är den 18 oktober 2024. Vi tar inte emot personligt brev i samband med din ansökan.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning, beredskap kommer att ingå när du kommit in i rutinerna.


Kontakta gärna rekryterande chef Malin Holmvall, 010 350 90 97, alternativt ansvarig rekryterare Victoria Waltenberg, 010 350 90 45. Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72 och Mikael Hedenheim, ST, 010 475 84 68. Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se.



#LI-DNI


**Övrig information**
---------------------


Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: Senior Platform Engineer
description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 3+ års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
  
Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.For our client we are looking for a Senior Platform Engineer.
  
  

At clients, they are making bold digital visions come true. They aim to lead in the automotive world by creating a digital ecosystem built around making the customers' lives less complicated. Now Client is looking for curious, creative people who want to change the world through innovative thinking.
  
  

What’s in it for you?
  
Client is on an ambitious journey to redefine the customer experience in automotive through digital technology. Electrification, Autonomous Drive and Shared Mobility are enablers for the purpose – freedom to move in a personal, sustainable, and safe way.
  
Software engineering is an increasingly important area in the automotive industry. Client is bringing more of the software development in-house to better handle continuous integration and the complex interactions between different functions. The data vision at Clients is powering innovation and every decision with trusted data and manage obstacles through innovative, robust designs and design for change.
  
  

This is a unit within Software Engineering, with a clear purpose to make the consumers feel special and rewarded by delivering leading Scandinavian design and seamless connectivity. They work in a fun and high-paced organization, and you can now join the department. Their mission is to provide trusted data and insights to understand product & process performance and customer behavior, enabling improved efficiency and better customer experience.
  
  

Client is growing and they are therefore now looking for curious, creative people who want to change the world through innovative thinking. They are looking for a Platform Engineer within Data and Analytics.
  
  

This team, working to accelerate and streamline the use of data, analytics, and AI. The team innovates and collaborates to offer a great user experience, and to provide a unified self-service platform.
  
  

What will you do?
  
As a Platform Engineer, you will be at the forefront of designing and building a Platform to bolster the data and analytics capabilities of the clients Engineering organization. Your responsibilities will include configuring and setting up cloud infrastructure, deploying and operating data-oriented applications on Kubernetes, and working closely with other teams and platform users to gather requirements and maintain seamless operations. They are in an early development phase, which means you will have the unique opportunity of contributing directly to the Platform's foundation. Your input will directly shape its trajectory, setting the stage for its future growth and success.
  
  

**Some of the tech they use today:**  

**Languages:** Python, Go
  
**Cloud infrastructure:** Azure, Kubernetes
  
**DevOps:** Terraform, Crossplane, GitHub Actions, Flux, Helm, Prometheus, Grafana, Vault
  
**PaaS:** Databricks, Snowflake
  
  

Who are you?
  
They are looking for a proactive individual with a solution-oriented mindset, who is proficient in the following areas:
  
Public cloud infrastructure (Azure, AWS, or equivalent).
  
Implementation of scalable infrastructure through an Infrastructure as Code (IaC) approach.
  
CI/CD with tools such as GitHub Actions, ArgoCD, etc.
  
Deployment and operation of applications and services on Kubernetes.
  
Design and implementation of internal developer platforms.
  
  

In addition, experience in any of the following is highly valued:
  
Networking, security, and reliability in enterprise cloud solutions.
  
Tools and technologies for working with Big Data, including event streaming (e.g. Kafka, MQTT), large-scale data processing (e.g. Apache Spark, Ray), and storage solutions for Big Data (e.g. Apache Iceberg, Delta Lake).
  
User and device authentication, data and resource access control, and data privacy protection.
  
  

Client believes you have minimum of 7 of experience in related fields , that you are familiar with Agile methods, and that you are fluent in English, both verbal and written. You are a person with a proactive approach, a problem solver, and a flexible team player. This role is based in Gothenburg, Sweden, and client is an office-first culture so you will be expected to work the majority of time from the office in Torslanda, Gothenburg.
  
  

Ansökan Tror du att du är Techster Solutions nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
  
Arbetsplats och kulturVi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
  
Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Test Data Management - Implementor to SEB
description:
SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone..
  
  

What you will be doing
  
Do you want to be part of our exciting solution rebuild? We will transition into a more modern Test Data Management (TDM) solution. Instead of developing our solution we will leverage the benefit of using a standard solution and customize it to our needs and requirements. We will add more value to our customers by proactively provide consistent test data. Join us in our journey!
  
You will be part of a professional Agile team responsible for providing tools for test data creation and de-identification that enable other SEB development teams to easily test their solutions. You will share your responsibilities with other team members.
  
  

**Key responsibilities:**  

Be a key player in the implementation of a new modern TDM solution to ensure efficiency, consistency, and security in our innovative financial tech environment.
  
Implement/onboard more and more data sources over time.
  
Administrate, configure and maintain the new solution.
  
Maintain current solutions during the transition period and support stakeholders(internal SEB development teams).
  
Guiding for the teams to prepare relevant test data for their testing.
  
  

**Must-have-skills:**  

Preferably you’re a Java developer with 1-2 years of experience or recent graduate, who is proactive and eager to take ownership.
  
You have experience with containerization tools such as Openshift, Docker and Kubernetes, ideally in a DevOps environment.
  
You have experience working with both Linux and Windows OS.
  
Fluency in English.
  
  

**Nice-to-have-skills:**  

Experience with Test Data Management solutions (e.g., K2view, Delphix, Datprof) or similar tools.
  
Knowledge of database architecture and design.
  
Experience in scripting (e.g., Bash) and automation.
  
Experienced with testing and knowledge of what kind of test data is required.
  
Knowledge of cloud technologies and DevOps tools.
  
Understanding of application development for various platforms
  
  

**Personal skills:**  

A curious mindset, willingness to develop yourself and learn new things.
  
**Analytical and structured:** Being able to analyze and structure system dependencies.
  
Collaborative and proactive problem solver who enjoys teamwork and taking initiative.
  
Selfdriven and enjoys being responsible for different assignments and projects
  
  

**What we offer:**  

Attractive compensation and benefits
  
Access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits
  
Flexible work-life balance
  
Extensive training and learning opportunities
  
Innovative company in forefront of technology
  
Agile and modern ways of working
  
  

This is not just a role – it’s a platform for growth. You’ll have the opportunity to deepen your technical skills, take ownership of exciting projects, and advance your career in a forward-thinking tech environment.
  
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
  
  

Ready to join us?
  
Apply before October the 20th, 2024. Applications are reviewed on a rolling basis, so apply today!
  
Learn more about working at SEB www.sebgroup.com/career
  
SEB is one of the largest Tech employers in the Nordics. We are international, business savvy techies that contribute to or are responsible for SEB’s banking software, ensuring that both internal and external products and services are delivered fast and efficiently, that access is always on, and that solutions are trusted and compliant. We work hard to future-proof SEB with world class digital architecture and the deployment of new technologies.

title: Technical Lead OR Solutions
description:
Help us make breakthrough innovations in healthcare.
  
If you're ready to have an impact in a career that makes a difference, Mölnlycke could be your next step. You’ll be helping to develop solutions that improve the efficiency and safety of operating rooms globally. And you’ll be part of a global organisation with an inspirational culture and plenty of opportunities for personal and professional growth. All the while building a successful career, with real purpose.
  
Are you passionate about leading technical development in cutting-edge digital solutions? Mölnlycke is now looking for a Tech Lead to join our ORS Global Digital Ecosystem team in Gothenburg. As Tech Lead, you will be a pivotal figure in driving and continuously developing our ORS digital solutions – the foundation of our efficiency solutions for the operating room.
  
  

About the Job
  
As the Tech Lead for ORS Digital Solutions, you'll have a hands-on role in leading and supporting the team in software development, technical architecture, and engineering work. You'll be responsible for developing and managing the architecture of our digital platforms, ensuring robust, scalable, and secure solutions. Collaborating closely with business stakeholders and partners, you’ll maximize the value of our ORS Digital Solutions, helping healthcare professionals achieve the best outcomes for patients.
  
  

**Your key responsibilities will include:**  

Driving and leading the development of ORS Digital Solutions.
  
Hands-on software development and contributing to DevOps practices and processes.
  
Securing alignment with overall architecture and security standards.
  
Promoting best practices in architecture and design, ensuring the solution meets changing business needs.
  
Managing the development of architectural and software artifacts for our applications and platforms.
  
Supporting the team with technical leadership and strategic guidance.
  
  

Your Growth and Development
  
At Mölnlycke, we value continuous learning and development. In this role, you’ll have the opportunity to:
  
Shape the future of digital health solutions with your technical leadership.
  
Collaborate with a diverse range of stakeholders, from business leaders to solution architects.
  
Advance your career with a company committed to innovation, digitalisation, and sustainability.
  
  

**What you’ll get:**  

Hybrid working.
  
Competitive benefits package.
  
Wellbeing initiatives.
  
  

**What you’ll need:**  

Degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or Information Technology.
  
Minimum 7 years of experience leading software development teams and projects.
  
Proficiency in full-stack web development and experience with API-oriented architecture.
  
Strong skills in frontend development (Vue, Angular, React) and backend development (.NET/Python/SQL).
  
Strong skills with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS) and containerization technologies (Kubernetes, Docker).
  
Strong skills with DevOps practices and tools such as Azure DevOps, Confluence, and Jira.
  
Experience in event-driven architectures and CI/CD processes.
  
Experience working with and managing external partners.
  
Ability to structure, simplify, visualize, and explain complex topics.
  
**Experience with any of the following would be a plus:** HR7/FHIR, SaMD, mobile applications.
  
Fluency in English is required.
  
  

Your Work-Life Balance
  
This is a hybrid role preferably based in Gothenburg HQ. Although HQ Sweden is preferred; we are open to considering other locations within Europe for the right candidate.
  
  

Our Approach to Diversity and Inclusion
  
We strive to have a diverse mix of people from different cultures, ages, geographies, and genders to reflect the world in which we operate and to facilitate innovative thinking across the business.
  
  

About Mölnlycke
  
Mölnlycke is a world-leading medical products and solutions company that equips healthcare professionals to achieve the best patient, clinical, and economic outcomes. Our business is organised into four business areas: Wound Care, Operating Room Solutions, Gloves, and Antiseptics, where customer centricity, sustainability, and digitalisation are at the heart of everything we do.
  
Mölnlycke employs around 8,700 people. The company headquarters are in Gothenburg, Sweden, and we operate in more than 100 countries worldwide. Mölnlycke is a founding partner of GoCo Health Innovation City, a world-class innovation cluster for health, and in early 2025, our headquarters will move there. Since 2007, the company has been part of Investor AB, an engaged owner of high-quality global companies.
  
For more information, please visit www.molnlycke.com and www.molnlycke.com/careers.

title: Jönköping site leader and team manager
description:
**OUR STORY**

At ST, we believe in the power of technology to drive innovation and make a positive impact on people, business, and society. We are a global semiconductor company, and our advanced technology & chips forms the hidden part of the world we live in today.


When you join ST, you will be part of a global business of more than 115+ nationalities and present in 40 countries, 50,000+, diverse and dedicated creators & makers of technology around the world!


Developing technologies takes more than talent: it takes amazing people who understands collaboration and respect. People with passion and desire to disrupt the status quo, push boundaries and drive innovation – whilst unlocking your own potential.
  

  

Working at ST means innovating for a future that we want to make smarter, greener, in a responsible and sustainable way. Our technology starts with you. Join us and start the future!


**YOUR ROLE**

You take the lead of the ST Jönköping site. This site is software competence center dedicated to the development of new STM32 tooling solutions, focusing on making the STM32 customer life's easier while maximizing the use of STM32 feature and performances.


ST Jönköping is a 10+ engineers site belonging to the STM32 tools department located on 5 different sites in 3 countries.


You will have 3 main essential missions with challenge to secure the STM32 #1 worldwide position in General Purpose microcontroller market, while developing our tooling offer for Microprocessors and Wireless products:


* **ST Jonkoping site leader**
* **ST Jonkoping team manager**
* **ST Jonkoping leader in Software technologies**

As **ST Jonkoping site leader,** your mission is to ensure local deployment of ST strategy, rules and process by:


* Creating a motivating and collaborative atmosphere to sustain excellent productivity and foster innovation
* Ensuring safety of all employees
* Building, negotiating and monitoring the site budget
* Federating collaborators on local projects and site development activities (universities, local administration)
* Developing and sustaining local networking with authorities, professional groups, ecosystem and schools
* Managing the local communication towards all collaborators
* Managing local audits
* Getting support from stakeholders to sustain HR services, facilities, Security and IT.
* Liaising with sub-contracting companies
* Developing site strategy within ST ecosystem
* Developing the sense of belonging to ST
* Handling crisis whatever its nature

As **ST Jonkoping team manager,** your mission is to drive software development team execution by:


* Allocating resources onto projects and maintaining a load plan
* Building training and ramp-up plans
* Following individuals performance
* Tackling potential bottlenecks in the multi-site / multi-cultural collaboration
* Reviewing mid and long term ambitions, defining the individual career paths
* Seeking for opportunities for the team

As **ST Jonkoping leader in Software technologies,** your mission is to contribute to overall STM32 tools roadmap by:


* Taking ownership on productive tasks on STM32Cube tools (Architecture, Project, Partnerships or Methodology axis)
* Contributing to the STM32 Tools department leaders community
* Supporting the STM32 Tools department manager in building the vision for the department
Aligning with all STM32Cube ecosystem stakeholders (Marketing, Embedded software, Support, hardware, partners)  
* 

**YOUR SKILLS & EXPERIENCES**

* Master degree in science, preferably in Software development
* >10 years of experience in multi-site and multi-cultural environment
* Strong experience in management, exercising proven leadership competencies in various positions and environments
* Experience in complex project operation
* Knowledge of matrix and hybrid organizations
* Practice of AGILE methodologies
* Ability to drive changes and get team adherence
* Extensive knowledge of software languages (C, RUST, TypeScript), Software projects, DevOps, software testing and validation
* Experience on various Software quality standards
* Past experience in Embedded software development or PC tools development
* English business proficiency
* French knowledge appreciated

We encourage candidates who may not meet every single requirement to apply, as we appreciate diverse perspectives and provide opportunities for growth and learning. Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (DEI) is part of our company culture. Our DEI vision is, “At ST, you can be the true version of yourself”, we value all employee contributions and have zero tolerance for any kind of discrimination.
  

  

Joining us is also about a greater work-life balance and workplace with equal opportunities. Dedicated Employee Resource Groups for women and LGBTQIA+, hybrid work arrangements are amongst the many DEI & Sustainability initiatives that make us a great place to evolve your career.


To discover more, visit st.com/careers
company_description: ST is a global semiconductor leader delivering intelligent and energy-efficient products and solutions that power the electronics at the heart of everyday life.

title: Platform Engineer – Azure
description:
**We are seeking a skilled Data Platform Engineer with expertise in Azure, hands-on experience in Data Factory and Databricks, and a** **strong background in data modelling.**
### **Assignment Description**


* Experience in data modeling to design and optimize data structures ensuring efficient storage, scalability and performance.
* You will work closely with Solution designer to make sure you build an effective and sustainable solution.
* Work will mainly relate to cloud services as Vattenfall use Microsoft Azure as a cloud platform.
* As part of the team you will take part in the development cycle (requirement analysis, design, development, test, deployment, hand over).
* Design, build and integrate data from various sources.
* Write complex data queries and create data infrastructure in a simple and efficient matter.
* Design and develop Power BI dashboard solutions for the business to make it possible to e.g. increase decision accuracy and improve process efficiency.
* Work closely with our business stakeholders with a strong focus on aligning with business and technical requirements


**Required Skills**


* At least a Bachelor’s within Computer Science or comparable field and you have experience in software development.
* Ability to integrate data from a variety of sources using integration and orchestration tools as Azure Data Factory and Databricks.
* Strong and experienced in Data Modeling to design efficient and scalable data structures.
* Experience in designing, implementing, and supporting enterprise-scale ETL / ELT pipelines.
* Well familiar with Microsoft Azure Data lake, Azure SQL database and data warehouse solutions.
* Design, develop and maintain Power BI reporting and self service solution.
* Strong in stakeholder management.
* Self-motivated and self-going.
* Swedish and English is required for this position.
**Personal Skills**
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.
* Strong in stakeholder management.
* You have a hands-on mentality to solve complex issues.
* You are skilled in understanding the customer demands and can support them and build sustainable solution in IT-landscape

title: Senior Backend & Infrastructure engineer
description:
**Software development that makes a difference**


At Volvo Cars, we are making bold digital visions come true. We aim to lead in the automotive world by creating a digital ecosystem built around making our customers' lives less complicated. Now we are looking for curious, creative people who want to change the world through innovative thinking.

  


**What's in it for you?**  

At Volvo Cars, we're pioneering a new frontier in automotive technology. Our core goals of sustainable transportation, mobility, and electrification now intertwine with an unprecedented focus on vehicle data accessibility and utilization. We're committed to creating a future where our vehicles not only provide safe, sustainable, and personal travel but also serve as data-rich platforms for innovation.

  

  

We've recognized that our vehicles and their associated software ecosystem present a unique opportunity. By making vehicle data more accessible, we're opening up new possibilities for integrating third-party products and services, contributing to a more sustainable and connected economy.

  

  

To drive this innovative mission at Volvo Cars, we at the Open Information Cluster are seeking an engaged and self-motivated experienced engineer. Your role will be crucial in building and shaping our partner technical capabilities, with a specific focus on vehicle data accessibility and utilization. Our goal is to revolutionize the capabilities and functionality of Volvo vehicles for our customers through data-driven innovation. We collaborate across the organization to enable internal and external developers, create robust APIs for vehicle data access, and support the rollout of comprehensive documentation.

  

  

Our team is a melting pot of cultures and genders, bringing together engineers and product managers with diverse backgrounds in computer science, informatics, and electronics. We're united by our passion for solving complex problems and turning vehicle data into valuable insights and applications.  

Our expanding portfolio now includes advanced APIs for vehicle data access, comprehensive documentation, and open data initiatives. We're at the forefront of this new data-driven paradigm, eagerly participating in internal hackathons and external competitions to showcase our expertise and innovative ideas—often bringing home awards for our groundbreaking work.

  

  

While this position is primarily based in our Gothenburg, Sweden office, we embrace a hybrid work model and collaborate closely with our teams in Stockholm, Sweden, and other locations worldwide.  

Join us in this first-of-its-kind engineering challenge as we redefine the future of automotive data accessibility and utilization.

  

  

**What will you be doing?**


* Assessing the design, implementation, and deployment needs of a containerized cloud infrastructure.
* Collaborating with colleagues to enable a pioneering, first-class data platform in the cloud.
* Utilizing design patterns and modern frameworks to build, maintain, and implement products and services within the Open Information Cluster cloud platform.
* Participating in design and development tasks while assisting peers with operational and implementation challenges.
* Applying modern software principles to evaluate options and performance trade-offs, while embracing the exploration and testing of new technologies.

  

  

**Your experience?**


* You are an experienced software engineer in an agile environment and are proficient in at least one modern programming language (e.g., Go, Java, or Python).
* You have experience of event-driven and microservices architectures and with cloud-native platforms.
* You prioritize end-to-end developer experience, recognizing its role in guiding and influencing other developers to improve their products and services.
* You have good understanding of API communication protocols and frameworks—such as GraphQL, gRPC, REST, or webhooks—and enjoy building scalable, performant, reliable, and highly available services.
* You have knowledge of cloud-native platforms and their usage, preferably Microsoft Azure or Amazon Web Services.

  


**Who are we?**


Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.

  

  

Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. The people of Volvo Cars are committed to making a difference in our world. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 40,000 employees across the globe. We believe in bringing out the best in each other and harnessing the true power of people. At Volvo Cars your career is designed around your talents and aspirations so you can reach your full potential. Join us on a journey of a lifetime as we create safety, autonomous driving and electrification technologies of tomorrow.
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: Technical recruiter
description:
Är du passionerad över att hitta och attrahera de bästa talangerna inom IT? Vi söker nu en driven teknisk rekryterare med fokus på att rekrytera spetskompetens inom IT till vårt växande konsultföretag med unika USPar (som vi gärna berättar mer om och som gör ditt jobb lättare). I den här centrala rollen kommer du att bidra till vår fortsatta tillväxt genom att rekrytera de bästa IT-specialisterna, samt vara med och skapa en inspirerande, trivsam samt utvecklande arbetsmiljö, för både nya och befintliga medarbetare. Du kommer rapportera till VD.


**Vilka är vi?**

Vi är ett personalägt konsultbolag med 40 anställda och omsätter 80 Mkr. Vår kultur präglas av engagemang, nyfikenhet och kompetens – tre värdeord som genomsyrar allt vi gör. Vår höga medarbetarnöjdhet, mätt genom eNPS, visar att vi är ett företag där människor trivs och utvecklas.


Du kommer att ha en central roll, där du är en viktig del av vår verksamhet. Din arbetsplats kommer att vara vid Fridhemsplan i Stockholm, med möjlighet till visst distansarbete.


**Vem är du?**


Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av att rekrytera inom IT eller teknik och som trivs med ett högt tempo i en föränderlig miljö. Du är självgående, resultatorienterad och brinner för att bygga relationer med både kandidater och befintliga medarbetare. Vi ser att du har en Universitetsexamen inom personalvetenskap / HR och har förmåga att växla perspektiv mellan hands-on rekrytering, löpande HR-arbete och att bidra till ledningens arbete med att utveckla och förbättra vår strategi inom HR och talent acquisition. Din fallenhet för att hitta rätt kompetens och samtidigt förstärka vårt employer brand är avgörande för vår framgång.


**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**


* Du kommer i huvudsak jobba med rekrytering, men vi ser gärna att du stöttar i andra frågor och växer in i andra arbetsuppgifter.
* Driva rekryteringsprocesser från start till mål, med fokus på att hitta och anställa de bästa IT-konsulterna. Vi ser gärna att du använder IT-stöd som en del i prospektering och processen för rekrytering
* Intervjuer med kandidater
* Vara med och skapa aktiviteter för våra medarbetare med kickoff mm
* employer branding, kommunikation och marknadsföringskampanjer, organisera events, konferenser och liknande evenemang
* Bidra till en trivsam arbetsmiljö och arbeta med initiativ för att stärka vårt interna engagemang och vår kultur.

**Dina kvalifikationer och erfarenheter:**


* Erfarenhet av rekrytering, gärna inom IT, konsulter eller annan tech.
* Förmåga att växla perspektiv mellan hands-on rekrytering, löpande HR-arbete och att bidra till ledningens arbete med att utveckla och förbättra vår strategi inom HR och talent acquisition.
* En utmärkt kommunikatör som har lätt för att bygga nätverk och relationer inom IT-sektorn.
* Kunskap och intresse för employer branding inom IT och tech.
* Flytande i både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift.

**Varför jobba med oss?** Hos oss får du ett varierat och utmanande arbete med stort ansvar och möjlighet att påverka. Du blir en del av ett företag med marknadens skarpaste IT-konsulter, där du får möjligheten att göra verklig skillnad för både företaget och våra medarbetare.


**Ansök här**


*IP-Solutions är ett kunskapsföretag som erbjuder lösningar ända fram till teknikens framkant inom* kommunikationsteknik och cloud. Mer om IP-Solutions finns på *www.ip-solutions.se*


*Om du som* kandidat vill ha mer information om tjänsten. Kontakta: *glenn.sernbrandt@ip-solutions.se**,* 0708 88 00 64


*Vi ber annons och tjänsteförsäljare att inte kontakta oss. Vi har redan* gjort våra val kring tjänster.

title: Channel Development Manager
description:
**Company Description**  

Arista Networks is an industry leader in data-driven, client-to-cloud networking for large data center, campus and routing environments. What sets us apart is our relentless pursuit of innovation. We leverage the latest advancements in cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and software-defined networking to provide our clients with a competitive edge in an increasingly interconnected world. Our solutions are designed to not only meet the current demands of the digital landscape but to also anticipate and adapt to future challenges.


Our commitment to excellence has earned us several prestigious awards, such as Best Engineering Team, Best Company for Diversity, Compensation, and Work-Life Balance. At Arista, we take pride in our track record of success and strive to maintain the highest standards of quality and performance in everything we do.vide our clients with a competitive edge in an increasingly interconnected world. Our solutions are designed to not only meet the current demands of the digital landscape but to also anticipate and adapt to future challenges.


At Arista we value the diversity of thought and perspectives that each employee brings to the table. We believe that fostering an inclusive environment, where individuals from various backgrounds and experiences feel welcome, is essential for driving creativity and innovation.

 **Job Description** **Who You’ll Work With**


As a Channel Development Manager at Arista Networks, your primary responsibility will be to drive partner-initiated revenue growth with our most strategic channel partners in the Nordics including Norway, Denmark, Sweden or Finland. You will utilize your exceptional presentation and relationship-building skills to convey Arista’s value proposition (spanning Data Center, Campus and Network Observability) to a diverse group of sales and technical staff while conducting on-going sales enablement.


You’ll be an integral member of the regional sales team, ensuring that we maximize field collaboration with our ‘go-to’ partners. Leading candidates will possess strong critical-thinking mentality, a commanding presence, and an entrepreneurial spirit.


At Arista, we’re committed to facilitate a disruptive shift in the way organizations design, deploy and operate their enterprise network…whether private, public, cloud-native or multi-cloud. This is no simple undertaking and the reason why we’re seeking energetic achievers who are as committed to shaping the future of client-to-cloud networking as we are.


Your activities will center on building solid rapport with partners to achieve measurable results in brand awareness across the channel, increased revenue and expanded share in campus market. Your success in this role will span the creation and execution of extraordinary business plans with each focus partner. You’ll be measured primarily on the joint business outcome with your regional partners while demonstrating your ability to work across all levels within the partner organization.


The channel organization at ARISTA is a strategic pillar for our continued growth and leadership position in Software Driven Cloud Networking and a critical component to accomplishing our mission. Channel development is an extension of our regional sales teams, with a laser-focused objective of empowering our esteemed channel partners to successfully identify opportunities in which we will collaborate to position ARISTA’s acclaimed products and services. This team is tasked with taking our industry-recognized achievements in Data Center into the Campus/Edge.


If you’re looking for a unique opportunity to be part of a fun and spirited team, putting your fingerprint on building a world-class channel, thriving in an exciting fast-moving market and making a difference with all your hard work…ARISTA could be a perfect match!

**What You'll Do**

* Develop and leverage executive partner relationships and continuously increase Arista mindshare across the organization
* Generate enthusiasm/drive among partner sales and engineering teams to sell Arista products and services
* Systematic cadence with ELITE, and ELITEPLUS partners to sharpen prospecting skills related to use cases where Arista excels
* Management/Oversight of Arista partners in the region with whom you will conduct on-going business planning.
* Active participation and contributing to the sales process with partners
* Business plans will be completed for each focus partner, reviewed/updated quarterly with KPIs
* Acute accountability for jointly-developed goals
* Bi-weekly review of partner-initiated opportunities
* Manage and enforce program level compliance with up-leveled partners
* Build, administer, manage and/or deliver accreditation training for partner sales and technical staff
* Develop and drive incentive programs (SPIFs) to scale pipeline build and accelerate closing business
* Oversight of MDF including funding allocation, resourcing & logistics to drive success in all partner-related demand generation activities
* Engage with key partners to develop proficiencies in delivering services around Arista solution set
* Ensure that partner portal is equipped with the right assets to ensure partners are effective in communicating ARISTA’s value proposition
* Recruit/Enlist/Enable new partners

  

**Qualifications**  

* 3+ years of channel management experience / vendor sales within the network industry
* BS/CS/BA Degree or equivalent in addition to previous background in sales or business development
* Excellent interpersonal and facilitation skills
* Desire to be part of and contribute to building a world-class channel program
* Tenacious and assertive ‘hunter’ mentality…just get it done!
* Ability to pivot between having a business value conversation with sales executives and a technical discussion with SEs & SAs
* Strong business acumen
* Must be available for impromptu partner meetings across region…open to 50%+ travel (local & regional)
* Fluent English and Nordics Languages are essential
* Currently resident in the Nordics ( Sweden, Finland or Denmark preferred ) - we do not offer relocation. This is a home working / field based role

title: Zero Trust Product Owner
description:
Alfa Laval is looking for a Product Owner for our Cybersecurity Zero Trust team
Every day, we get opportunities to make a positive impact – on our colleagues, partners, customers and society. Together, we’re pioneering the solutions of the future and unlocking the full potential of precious resources. Trusted to act on initiative, we challenge conventional thinking to develop world-leading technologies that inspire progress in vital areas, including energy, food, water and shipping. As we push forward, the innovative, open spirit that fuels our 140-year-old start-up culture and rapid growth also drives our personal growth. So, as we shape a more resourceful, less wasteful world, we build our careers too.
About the job
As a Product Owner, you play a crucial role in advancing Cybersecurity. Joining a dynamic team, you'll focus on Alfa Laval’s Zero trust journey and collaborate across the whole company, ensuring a prioritized backlog. This position is a permanent employment, available in Lund or Krakow, with the hiring manager based in Lund.
Key tasks:* Collaborate closely with stakeholders, bridging the gap between business and technology.
* Manage and prioritize the team backlog, addressing priorities, dependencies, and resource challenges.
* Lead and support an Agile development team of cybersecurity experts.
* Project management of Zero trust activities and deliveries.


Who you are
You thrive in the intersection of business and IT, excelling in translating between the two languages. A strong networker, you understand the importance of customer-focused work and excel in an international, cross-cultural environment. Building trust in your expertise and solutions comes naturally to you.
What you know* 5+ years experience in a similar role and hands on experience working with Zero Trust in an enterprise environment.
* Extensive knowledge of cloud computing operating systems, architecture designs, and enterprise networks.
* Expertise in designing solutions that seamlessly integrate with enterprise environments while complying with both business and technical requirements.
* Strong analytical skills empower you to assess current digital solutions and identify areas for improvement, while your excellent communication skills allow you to gather requirements from stakeholders and convey technical information clearly.
* Experience with agile methodologies equips you to manage development teams efficiently, driving projects towards successful outcomes.


What’s in it for you?
Join a dynamic environment that offers exciting challenges and opportunities within an international, open, and friendly culture. At Alfa Laval, we support each other's growth and development to create value for our customers.
Assessment information
We care about diversity, inclusion, and equity in our recruitment processes. We also believe behavioral traits can provide important insights into a candidate's fit to a role. To help us achieve this we apply Pymetrics assessments, and upon application you will be invited to play the assessment games.
For more information, please contact:
Manal Mohamed, Talent Acquisition Partner, manal.mohamed@alfalaval.com
For union information, please contact:  

Johan Ranhög, Akademikerna, +46 46 2891664  

Stefan Sandell, Ledarna, +46 46 367364  

Bror Garcia Lantz, Unionen, +46 709 366985
We are reviewing applications continuously, make sure to send in yours as soon as possible.
At Alfa Laval, we pride ourselves on creating an inclusive and dynamic workplace that values diverse perspectives and experiences. While we typically welcome applicants from all locations, for this particular role, we are prioritizing candidates who are currently residing in Lund or Krakow or have an established presence in the area.
Please, send in your application as soon as possible and not later than, October 27th 2024. Due to GDPR we don’t accept applications sent directly via email, they will be automatically disregarded.
#LI-MM1

title: Senior Network Technician
description:
Har du expertis inom nätverks- och brandväggslösningar från Cisco, Fortinet och/eller Aruba? Vill du ta din kompetens till nästa nivå och vara med och forma framtidens nätverksinfrastruktur? Ta chansen att göra skillnad med din kunskap och bidra till banbrytande lösningar!


Jag heter Greg Szuh och jag ansvarar för grupperingen Managed Network. Här har vi samlat tekniska specialister, arkitekter och tjänsteägare för området nätverk och vi är navet av Telia Cygates driftaffär för nätverk. Just nu söker vi en medarbetare inom Nätverk/Säkerhet som har vilja och engagemang att utvecklas tillsammans med oss.  



  

**Din nästa utmaning?**

Som Nätverkstekniker hos oss blir du en nyckelspelare i en central grupp som arbetar med våra Managed Services, där du är med och levererar skräddarsydda nätverkslösningar till våra kunder, och säkerställer en smidig drift och förvaltning. I din roll får du arbeta operativt med allt från konfiguration och felsökning till att driva spännande projekt som on- och offboarding av kunder och tjänster.


Du är en viktig länk mellan nätverksgrupperingen och andra avdelningar och får möjlighet att samarbeta kring tjänster inom säkerhet, Cloud, automation, virtualisering och compute/storage. Hos oss jobbar du både självständigt och i team, med stora möjligheter att utveckla din kompetens. Om du vill certifiera dig inom något specialistområde framöver, stöttar vi dig hela vägen.


**Vem är du?**

Som person motiveras du av att arbeta nära kunder och kommer särskilt till din rätt när du får utmana med nya tankar och idéer. Du involverar och håller kunder som kollegor informerade genom att kommunicera på ett tydligt och enkelt sätt, och söker aktivt feedback för att förbättra ditt arbete och vår leverans.


**Din erfarenhet:**

* Du har troligtvis 5 år eller mer arbetslivserfarenhet inom nätverk/säkerhet.
* Du innehar troligtvis Cisco-certifiering på Professional-nivå eller har motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet.
* Mycket goda kunskaper inom nät- och nätsäkerhets produkter/tjänster inom enterprisemiljöer, såsom routing/switching, brandväggar.
* Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska
* Arbetat enligt ITIL-ramverk

**Extra meriterande är om arbetat med något av nedanstående:**

* God kunskap kring nätverkssegmentering och dot1x
* God kunskap kring Cisco FTD/FMC
* God kunskap kring MPLS

**Varför Telia Cygate?**  

På Telia Cygate är vi inte bara experter på nätverk, säkerhet och olika slags moln – vi är också ett gäng som tycker att det ska vara kul att gå till jobbet! Som en del av Telia Company har vi styrkan att skapa verklig påverkan i stor skala, bidra till samhällsnytta och hjälpa våra kunder att navigera i digitaliseringens värld. Vi gör det alltid med värme, omtanke och ett leende. Här är det idéerna och våra olika perspektiv som gör oss starka, och tillsammans ser vi till att teknikens värld blir en plats där alla trivs – och där du hör hemma.


Hos oss är din utveckling viktig. Vi uppmuntrar till kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling och ser till att just du och dina intressen är i fokus. Vi vet att det är människorna som utgör vårt företag, och därför värdesätter vi glädje, kreativitet och olika perspektiv i allt vi gör.
  

  

Välkommen att växa tillsammans med oss, där vi gör teknik mänsklig och skapar verklig påverkan!


**Intresserad?**  

Vi lovar att du kommer att börja en spännande resa hos oss samtidigt som du har mycket roligt på vägen. Placeringsort är Stockholm eller Karlstad. Om du har några frågor så får du gärna kontakta mig Greg Szuh på 072–7266534 eller gergely.szuh@cygate.se eller på Linkedin.


Bakgrundskontroller är en del av vår rekryteringsprocess.
  

  

**Välkommen till Telia Cygate – Home of your next big opportunity**
